product_name: JVC ADDIXION Flexible Camera Mount - Wide
long_description: The wide JVC ADDIXION flexible camera mount adheres your ADDIXION or ADDIXION 2 action camera to a flat or curved surface with included 3M double-sided tape. Includes one ball joint and two base plates.
short_description: The wide JVC ADDIXION flexible camera mount adheres your ADDIXION or ADDIXION 2 action camera to a flat or curved surface with included 3M double-sided tape.
